# Changelog

This changelog track changes to the qoqo-tket project starting at version v0.1.0

## 0.2.0

* Added link to the API documentation in the readme.
* Updated to pytket 2.4.

## 0.1.3

* Fixed sphinx issues.

## 0.1.2

* Fix documentation.

## 0.1.1

* Fix Windows building issues. 

## 0.1.0

* Initial commit.
